items.sentence: Tom was waiting for me in front of the school.
The ashtray was brimming with cigarette butts.
The murder charge was reduced to manslaughter.
Please don't blow your nose on the tablecloth.
I didn't have the heart to tell her the truth.
The washing machine makes my housework easier.
He spent a few months wandering around Europe.
Sit yourself down, Tom. I've made some supper.
Tom doesn't like it when his juice isn't cold.
Tom wasn't the first person to enter the room.
I deserve the blame for how things turned out.
Do you want a glass? There's one on the table.
Unfortunately, I can't accept your invitation.
